articles.title: You've never seen Mars like this: NASA on pics of Mars - Inshorts
articles.description: NASA shared two images of Mars taken by its Mars Atmosphere and Volatile EvolutioN (MAVEN) spacecraft. "You've never seen Mars like this...Our MAVEN mission got some stunning tie-dye views of Mars in these two ultraviolet images," NASA wrote on Instagram. "MA…
